comment._content: Probably not a whole lot of fun to stand on hard pavement all day, in heat or cold, impersonating a traffic light . . . .

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: According to this photograph, this hotel was built in 1890 (Tom Fletcher's NYC Architecture and Wikipidea say 1900) and was demolished in 1907: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?709038F and here's a 1908 photo of the present day Plaza Hotel: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?1507101
